##  __

Visit And Explore

## 

Visit And Explore __

The Seneca Nation has a long history that is rooted in the Western New York region. We’d love to have you visit us at the Seneca-Iroquois National Museum located in Salamanca, NY to learn how we have grown as a sovereign nation, how we have persevered over our challenges, and how we celebrate our culture and heritage. Immerse yourself in our rich history and culture today.

We offer self-guided tours and guided tours. A guided tour is a one-time fee of $20. The price covers the entire group. To schedule a guided tour, please contact the museum directly at 716-945-1760.

Veterans . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . $10.00

Home2025-10-10T11:14:50-04:00

## NYA:WËH SGËNÖ’

### We welcome you to visit us at the Onöhsagwë:de’ Cultural Center. Learn about our history through our [exhibitions](https://www.senecamuseum.org/exhibits/), from our traditionally crafted items in [They Make](https://www.senecamuseum.org/portfolio/they-make/) to The Creation Story in [When It Began](https://www.senecamuseum.org/portfolio/when-it-began/). Learn about our [antler carvings](https://www.senecamuseum.org/portfolio/antler-carvings/) or ornate [beadwork](https://www.senecamuseum.org/portfolio/beadwork/) in our [collections](https://www.senecamuseum.org/collections/). Shop our online store for [original art](https://shop.senecamuseum.org). [Plan a trip](https://www.senecamuseum.org/plan-your-visit/) and join us for one of our [special events](https://www.senecamuseum.org/events/).
